title: The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking
creator_credit: Columbia, Gary Mehlman, Walter Moshay and Ken Annakin
brief_description: Based on the classic books by Astrid Lindgren, Pippi Longstocking bursts onto the screen in this all new live action motion picture. Loved the world over by young and old, Pippi Longstocking is a pigtailed, freckle faced ball of fun and energy. Mischievous, lovable and always in trouble, Pippi is a young orphan who refuses to let anything stand in her way. Full of colourful characters, fun and laughs “The new adventures of Pippi Longstocking” is a delightful adventure movie for the young and the young at heart.
